name: Capon Bege
text: If you have a (Supernova) type Character other than [Capon Bege] that would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may add that Character to the top of your Life cards face down instead.

effect.text: If you have a (Supernova) type Character other than [Capon Bege] that would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may add that Character to the top of your Life cards face down instead.
